mapper.insert:
insert into likl_user
select last_insert_id()
USER_NAME,
USER_PASSWORD,
USER_BIRTHDAY,
USER_GENDER,
USER_REMART,
ORGA_ID,
#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userBirthday,jdbcType=DATE},
#{userGender,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{userRemart,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{orgaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update likl_user
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_PASSWORD = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_BIRTHDAY = #{userBirthday,jdbcType=DATE},
USER_GENDER = #{userGender,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_REMART = #{userRemart,jdbcType=CHAR},
ORGA_ID = #{orgaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_BIRTHDAY, USER_GENDER, USER_REMART, ORGA_ID from likl_user where USER_NAME=#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and USER_PASSWORD=#{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_BIRTHDAY, USER_GENDER, USER_REMART, ORGA_ID from likl_user where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_BIRTHDAY, USER_GENDER, USER_REMART, ORGA_ID from likl_user where USER_NAME = '${userName}';

select U.USER_ID, U.USER_NAME, U.USER_BIRTHDAY, U.USER_GENDER, U.USER_REMART, U.ORGA_ID from likl_user U where (U.ORGA_ID in ( select O.ORGA_ID from likl_orga O where O.ORGA_PARENT = #{orgaId,jdbcType=INTEGER})) or U.ORGA_ID = #{orgaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

sql.if: USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_BIRTHDAY, USER_GENDER, USER_REMART, ORGA_ID

mapper.select:
select
distinct
from likl_user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into likl_user (USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_PASSWORD, USER_BIRTHDAY, USER_GENDER, USER_REMART, ORGA_ID) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{userGender,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userRemart,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{orgaId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update:
update user
USER_ID = #{record.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_NAME = #{record.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_PASSWORD = #{record.userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_BIRTHDAY = #{record.userBirthday,jdbcType=DATE},
USER_GENDER = #{record.userGender,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_REMART = #{record.userRemart,jdbcType=CHAR},
ORGA_ID = #{record.orgaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update likl_user set USER_ID = #{record.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USER_NAME = #{record.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_PASSWORD = #{record.userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_BIRTHDAY = #{record.userBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, USER_GENDER = #{record.userGender,jdbcType=CHAR}, USER_REMART = #{record.userRemart,jdbcType=CHAR}, ORGA_ID = #{record.orgaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update likl_user
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_PASSWORD = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_BIRTHDAY = #{userBirthday,jdbcType=DATE},
USER_GENDER = #{userGender,jdbcType=CHAR},
USER_REMART = #{userRemart,jdbcType=CHAR},
ORGA_ID = #{orgaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update likl_user set USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_PASSWORD = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_BIRTHDAY = #{userBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, USER_GENDER = #{userGender,jdbcType=CHAR}, USER_REMART = #{userRemart,jdbcType=CHAR}, ORGA_ID = #{orgaId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
